short_description: Shift Mobile Bay ship channel dredge disposal away from in-bay open-water placement toward beneficial use and offshore/upland alternatives, backed by funding and enforceable commitments.
case_for_change_summary: USACE/Port in-bay thin-layer placement is asserted to be short-lived, but available literature and Mobile Bay disposal scale raise concerns about repeated burial/smothering impacts to benthic communities and knock-on effects to oysters, seagrasses, and fisheries. The project seeks an agreed transition plan to reduce and ultimately end non-beneficial in-bay disposal, using beneficial use projects plus offshore/upland options enabled by appropriations and policy change.
